title: Knife, 1985-103-222, ca. 1700–1800
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Leaf-shaped silver-gilt blade with straight edges. Angular bolster. Banded ferrule. White porcelain handle, irregularly shaped, with polychromed decoration; on front, a young woman sitting in front of a tree holding a flower wreath in one hand. On back, a young man running. Floral decoration at end of handle.
